Text.Name: Talk_TianJi
Text.Hate.0: Something is talking? Why can't I see it?
Text.Hate.1: Oh? It's you? Tell me a joke, or I'll beat you to pulp.
Text.Normal.0: Hurry up. I'm gonna start betting.
Text.Normal.1: (Yawns) Tell me when you are finished.
Text.Like.0: (Puts down the dice) Hello, do you want to place a bet?
Text.Like.1: You can wander around as you see fit.
Text.Submiss.0: Long time no see. What do you want?
Text.Submiss.1: It's you again. What have you been up to lately?
Text.GiftLike.0: It's such a good day. Feels better than dual cultivation.
Text.GiftLike.1: Thank you so much. I've always wanted this!
Text.LowValueGift.0: This? Even mortals won't be tricked.
Text.LowValueGift.1: This reminds me of the days where I had no money or food. Get out.
